title: Boutique Country Food & Wine Escape Near Tamworth
description: Award-winning gourmet food and wine awaits at this one-of-a-kind boutique property where you’ll find cosy, yet stylish accommodation surrounded by the Liverpool Ranges, national parks and country-music bars of nearby rural Tamworth. Includes a breakfast hamper, charcuterie board at the award-winning Glasshouse Restaurant, bottle of bubbly and more.

title: Boutique Country Food & Wine Escape Near Tamworth
description: Award-winning gourmet food and wine await at Goonoo Goonoo Station, a one-of-a-kind boutique property where you’ll find cosy, yet stylish accommodation surrounded by the Liverpool Ranges, national parks and country-music bars of nearby rural Tamworth. Get away from it all and relax with your loved one or a group of friends in this beautiful heritage destination. Enjoy a delicious breakfast hamper (weekdays only), entrée at the award-winning Glasshouse Restaurant, a welcome bottle of sparkling wine and guaranteed 1pm early check-in.
